QuestData.Title: Hero's Call: Shadowmoon Valley!
QuestData.Description:
All able-bodied citizens of the Alliance are to report to Prophet Velen in Shadowmoon Valley on Draenor.
The destruction of the Dark Portal has stopped the Iron Horde invasion of Azeroth, but now we must to take the fight to them.
With Prophet Velen's blessing, we will be able to establish a strategic position in Draenor to fight against the enemies of Azeroth.
Glory to the Alliance!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Prophet Velen in Shadowmoon Valley on Draenor.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Prophet Velen in Shadowmoon Valley on Draenor.
